tables_error.title: Tables Error
tables_error.body: The tables XML document could not be located.

settings_error.title: Database Settings Error
settings_error.body: There was a problem retrieving the '%1' setting '%2' from the database.%lb%lb%3%lb%4

main.setting_not_found: The '%1' setting '%2' could not be found in the database.

extensions_error.title: Extensions Error
extensions_error.body: There was a problem retrieving the extensions list from the database.%lb%lb%1%lb%2

extension_missing.title: Extension Missing
extension_missing.body: Your installation requires an extension that appears to be missing. Please upload the %1 install files and then install the extension in the database.

template_not_found.title: Template Not Found
template_not_found.body: A template for the page you have requested (%1) could not be found.

missing_action_error.title: Missing Extension or Action
missing_action_error.body: You did not provide an extension or an action to perform.

invalid_path_error.title: Invalid Action Path
invalid_path_error.body: You have requested an invalid action path (%1).

main.return_main: Click here to return to the main page.
main.return_previous: Click here to return to the previous page.

session_error.title: Session Error
session_error.body: There was a problem retrieving the session from the database.%lb%lb%1%lb%2

update_session_error.title: Update Session Error
update_session_error.body: There was a problem updating the current session.%lb%lb%1%lb%2

delete_session_error.title: Delete Session Error
delete_session_error.body: There was a problem deleting a session from the database.%lb%lb%1%lb%2

create_session_error.title: Create Session Error
create_session_error.body: There was a problem creating a new session.%lb%lb%1%lb%2

create_account_error.title: Account Creation Error
create_account_error.body: There was a problem storing your account information.%lb%lb%1%lb%2

activation_required.title: Account Activation Required
activation_required.body: Your account has been created, but further action on your part is required in order to activate it. An e-mail has been dispatched to you at %1 with further instructions.

account_created.title: Registration Successful
account_created.body: Your account has been created and is ready to use. An e-mail has been sent to %2 as a confirmation.

logged_in.title: Logged In Successfully
logged_in.body: You are now logged in and may view the site as a registered member.

main.unknown_user: That account could not be found.
main.return_login: Click here to return to the login page.

login.user_name_required: You did not enter a username.
login.user_password_required: You did not enter a password.
login.login_incomplete: You did not fill out the login form completely.
login.wrong_password: You did not provide the correct password for that account.
login.account_not_found: An account with that username could not be found.

success.title: Logged Out Succesfully
success.body: You have been logged out of your account.

reset.reset_incomplete: You did not provide an e-mail address.
reset.user_email_required: You did not provide an e-mail address.

success.title: Account Disabled
success.body: Your account has been disabled successfuly.

register.user_name_format_nospecial: Usernames can only contain letters and numbers.
register.user_name_minchars: Your username must be at least %1 characters.
register.user_email_required: You must enter a valid e-mail address.
register.user_password_format_nospecial: Passwords can only contain letters and numbers.
register.user_password_minchars: Your password must be at least %1 characters.
register.user_confirm_email_confirm: You did not enter the same e-mail address twice.
register.user_confirm_password_confirm: You did not enter the same password twice.
register.user_agree_required: You must agree to the terms and conditions before creating an account.
register.user_email_format_email: You did not enter a valid e-mail address.
register.register_incomplete: You did not fill out the registration form completely.
register.user_email_exists: An account with this e-mail address already exists.
register.user_email_available: That e-mail has not been used yet.
register.registration_successful: Thank you for creating an account at %1
register.user_terms_agree_required: You must agree to the Terms of Service.
register.user_privacy_agree_required: You must read and understand the Privacy Policy.
register.user_community_agree_required: You must agree to the Community Rules.
register.user_birthdate_wrong_format: The birthdate you enter must be in the form MM/DD/YYYY.
register.invalid_postal_code: You entered an invalid postal code.
register.user_too_young: You do not meet the age requirements to create an account.
register.user_name_minlength: Your username must be at least %1 characters long.
register.user_name_maxlength: Your username cannot be longer than %1 characters.
register.user_password_minlength: Your password must be at least %1 characters long.

success.title: Registration Completed!
success.body: Your account information is up to date and you may now browse the site freely.
success.return: Click here to access your Control Panel and fill out your community profile

success.title: Darth Hater Password Reset Requested
success.body: A new password has been created for your account and e-mailed to you.

db_error.title: Database Error
db_error.body: The database could not be accessed.

query_error.title: Database Query Error
query_error.body: There was a problem with a query made to the database.%lb%lb%1%lb%2

update_permissions.success: Permissions for this item have successfully been updated.

view_admin.denied: You do not have sufficient priviledges to access the administration system.
view_admin.title: View Admin
view_admin.description: Determines if a user can access the administration system.

change_settings.denied: You do not have sufficient priviledges to edit site settings.
change_settings.title: Change Settings
change_settings.description: Determines if a user can change global site settings.

manage_styles.denied: You do not have sufficient priviledges to edit site styles.
manage_styles.title: Manage Styles
manage_styles.description: Determines if a user can manage site styles.

manage_users.denied: You do not have sufficient priviledges to manage users.
manage_users.title: Manage Users
manage_users.description: Determines if a user can manage the site users.

manage_user_roles.denied: You do not have sufficient priviledges to manage user roles.
manage_user_roles.title: Manage User Roles
manage_user_roles.description: Determines if a user can manage user roles.

manage_permissions.denied: You do not have sufficient priviledges to manage permissions.
manage_permissions.title: Manage Permissions
manage_permissions.description: Determines if a user can manage permissions.

bypass_maintenance.title: Bypass Maintenance Page
bypass_maintenance.description: Allows a user to bypass the maintenance page.

error.title: Authentication Extension Error
error.missing_tier_name: You did not provide a tier name.
error.missing_group_name: You did not provide a permission group.
error.missing_target: You did not provide a permission target.
error.missing_bit: You did not provide the bit value for the permission you are editing.

debug_mode.title: Debug Mode
debug_mode.description: When activated, errors give more detail.

default_style.title: Default Style
default_style.description: The default style that users see when they view the site as a guest.

override_style.title: Override User Style
override_style.description: When activated, all user preferred styles are overridden with the site's default style.

cookie_name.title: Cookie Name
cookie_name.description: The name that cookies are stored as on the user's computer.

cookie_domain.title: Cookie Domain
cookie_domain.description: The domain to store cookies under. May affect the site's ability to access cookies if improperly entered.

cookie_path.title: Cookie Path
cookie_path.description: The path on the user's computer to store the cookies.

admin_email.title: Administrator E-mail Address
admin_email.description: The e-mail address that all administrator related e-mails are sent to.

default_timezone.title: Default Timezone
default_timezone.description: The hour offset that all times on the site are displayed. Example: -5 means UTC-5.

admin_directory.title: Administration Directory
admin_directory.description: The path from the root that the administration can be reached at. If you change this here, you must also rename the actual directory.

unsecure_session_length.title: Unsecure Session Length
unsecure_session_length.description: The amount of time - in seconds - to keep unsecure sessions open.

secure_session_length.title: Secure Session Length
secure_session_length.description: The amount of time - in seconds - to keep secure sessions open.

ip_security.title: IP Security
ip_security.description: Double check user IPs against their last recorded IP for added security.

password_minlength.title: Minimum Password Length
password_minlength.description: The minimum number of characters a user's password may contain.

name_minlength.title: Minimum Username Length
name_minlength.description: The minimum number of characters a username may contain.

activation_required.title: Activation Required
activation_required.description: When activated, users are sent an e-mail containing an activation code, and they must endure a process to get their account activated.

authenticate_all_with_permission.title: Default Permissions Error
authenticate_all_with_permission.body: There was a problem populating the default permissions for this item.%lb%lb%1

reset.unknown_user: That user could not be found.

not_found.title: Your Force Sight Fails You
not_found.body: Stop digging around where you don't belong, Acolyte.

template_not_found.title: Template Not Found
template_not_found.body: The template '%1' could not be found.

timezone.title: Timezone (UTC Offset)
timezone.description: Your home timezone's offset from %lta href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_time_zones_by_UTC_offset" target="_blank"%gtUTC%lt/a%gt (The default, EST, is -5)

show_email.title: Show E-mail Address
show_email.description: Allow other users to see your e-mail address.

show_birthdate.title: Show Birthdate
show_birthdate.description: Allow other users to see your birthdate in your profile.

online_status.title: Show Online Status
online_status.description: Allow other users to see when you are online.
